resources.string:
!can't connect the server usinf WAN connection 
 - Wan connectivity may not have established. 
 - Public ip of server is incorrectly set.
 - Please ensure that WAN is ON in the device. 
 - Check mobile client settings in the device

!can't connect the server usinf wifi or LAN 
 - wifi or LAN may be disconnected. 
 - Local IP of server is incorrectly set.
 - Please ensure that wifi or LAN is ON in the device. 
 - Check mobile client settings in the device
